selectType.description: Selection type for the table. Default is 'none'.

selectOnClick.description: If set to true, rows will be selected when clicked (vs. selection by checkbox).

selectedValueProp.description: If set, this property is used when displaying info on selection information bar.

allowEdit.description: If set to true, entries are editable.

allowCreate.description: If set to true, new entries can be created.

allowDelete.description: If set to true, entries can be deleted.
